languages.text: "Я хочу лично возглавить расследование. Раз это вызов мне, то мне с ним и разбираться".
"I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."
languages.original_text: "Я хочу лично возглавить расследование. Раз это вызов мне, то мне с ним и разбираться".

traits.locale_text: "I wish to handle the investigation myself. If they think they can contemn my authority, I shall take matters into my own hands."
"I wish to handle the investigation myself. If they think they can contemn my authority, I shall take matters into my own hands."
"I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."
"I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."
"I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."
"I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."

languages.text: «Me encargaré de la investigación personalmente. Si pretenden desafiarme, no me quedaré de brazos cruzados».
languages.original_text: "I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."

traits.locale_text: «Me encargaré de la investigación personalmente. Si pretenden desafiarme, no me quedaré de brazos cruzados».

languages.text: 「この調査は私が担当しよう。連中が私に挑戦したいというのであれば、私自身の手で問題を解決してやろう」
languages.original_text: "I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."

traits.locale_text: 「この調査は私が担当しよう。連中が私に挑戦したいというのであれば、私自身の手で問題を解決してやろう」

languages.text: “我打算亲自指挥调查工作。既然那些家伙敢挑战我的权威，那我打算亲自会会他们。”
languages.original_text: "I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."

traits.locale_text: “我打算亲自指挥调查工作。既然那些家伙敢挑战我的权威，那我打算亲自会会他们。”

languages.text: "Ich werde die Untersuchung selbst leiten. Wenn sie mich herausfordern wollen, nehme ich die Sache selbst in die Hände."
languages.original_text: "I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Untersuchung selbst leiten. Wenn sie mich herausfordern wollen, nehme ich die Sache selbst in die Hände."

languages.text: « Je vais me charger moi-même de l'enquête. S'ils veulent me défier, il ne me reste plus qu'à prendre les choses en main. »
languages.original_text: "I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais me charger moi-même de l'enquête. S'ils veulent me défier, il ne me reste plus qu'à prendre les choses en main. »

languages.text: "Bu incelemeyle bizzat ilgileneceğim. Eğer bana meydan okumak istiyorlarsa ipleri elime almam gerekir."
languages.original_text: "I will handle the investigation myself. If they wish to challenge me, then I shall take matters into my own hands."
